name: Diona
title: Kätzlein Cocktail
description: Despite being a bartender at the Cat's Tail, she loathes alcohol and will stop at nothing to ruin Mondstadt's wine industry — a feat easier said than done when her patrons absolutely love her drinks. She is the daughter of Draff, a hunter in Springvale.

skills.name: Kätzlein Style
skills.description: Normal Attack: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack: Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG. Plunging Attack: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Icy Paws
skills.description: Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target. Press: Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws. Hold: Dashes back quickly before firing 5 Icy Paws. The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus. The shield has a 250% Cryo DMG Absorption Bonus, and will cause your active character to become affected by Cryo at the point of formation for a short duration.

skills.name: Signature Mix
skills.description: Tosses out a special cold brew that deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE. Drunken Mist: Deals continuous Cryo DMG to opponents within the AoE. Continuously regenerates the HP of characters within the AoE.

passives.name: Complimentary Bar Food
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, Diona has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

passives.name: Cat's Tail Secret Menu
passives.description: Characters shielded by Icy Paws have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.

passives.name: Drunkards' Farce
passives.description: Opponents who enter the AoE of Signature Mix have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.

constellations.name: A Lingering Flavor
constellations.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.

constellations.name: Shaken, Not Purred
constellations.description: Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%. Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

constellations.name: A—Another Round?
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wine Industry Slayer
constellations.description: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

constellations.name: Double Shot, on the Rocks
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
constellations.description: Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts: Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%. Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.
